plaqueRemoval.title: Plaque Removal 101
plaqueRemoval.description: Clinical studies show oscillatingâ€“rotating electric brushes remove up to 21% more plaque after 3 months compared with manual brushes.

replaceInterval.title: Change Heads Every 90 Days
replaceInterval.description: After about 3 months bristles splay and become less effective. Replace the brush or head every 90 days.

fluorideTiming.title: Don't Rinse Fluoride Away
fluorideTiming.description: Spitâ€”don't rinseâ€”after brushing so fluoride keeps protecting your enamel.

pressure.title: Easy on the Pressure
pressure.description: Brushing harder doesn't clean better; excessive force may harm your gums.

tongueClean.title: Don't Forget the Tongue
tongueClean.description: 60â€“90% of bad breath compounds originate from the tongue's surface. A quick 10-second scrape can reduce volatile sulfur compounds by half.
